name: Food Delivery Price Intelligence
description: Restaurant search, delivery fees, price comparisons across Yelp, DoorDash, Grubhub. Location-based food delivery analytics. $0.005/query via x402.
longDescription: Multi-platform food delivery price intelligence aggregating data from Yelp, DoorDash, and Grubhub. Search restaurants by query and location, find popular restaurants, filter by cuisine type, and get price analytics (average delivery fees, rating distributions, price level breakdowns). Returns structured JSON with restaurant name, address, rating, review count, price level, cuisine types, delivery fee, delivery time, minimum order, coordinates, and platform source. Ideal for market research, competitive analysis, and location-based intelligence.
